news.title: Israeli strike on Gaza school sheltering displaced Palestinians kills dozens, officials say
news.summary: Children are among those who died in the attack, which Israel says targeted a Hamas command centre.

news.title: King Charles is heading to Canada - but it's more than just a royal visit
news.summary: The King and Queen will be arriving in Canada on Monday for a visit seen as a symbol of support.

news.title: Rushdie 'pleased' with attacker's maximum sentence
news.summary: Author Sir Salman Rushdie says he hopes the man who stabbed him "reflects upon his deeds" in jail.

news.title: The people who think AI might become conscious
news.summary: With a leap in the evolution of large language models, some leading thinkers are questioning whether AI might become sentient

news.title: A self-created fairy story: The rise and fall of Michelle Mone
news.summary: A new documentary follows the bra firm founder's journey from poverty to fame, fortune and controversy.

news.title: Japan flight made emergency landing after man tried opening door
news.summary: Police said the man was "having a medical crisis" and was restrained by fellow passengers and crew.

news.title: HS2 investigating two firms supplying construction staff
news.summary: The company building the high-speed rail line says it takes all whistleblower allegations seriously.

news.title: Who were 'superb'? Who were a 'shambles'? BBC Sport reviews the Premier League season
news.summary: BBC Sport chief football writer Phil McNulty reviews the Premier League season - and looks back to his August predictions.

news.title: Head of controversial Israel-backed Gaza aid group resigns
news.summary: The UN has said the Gaza Humanitarian Foundation's plan would make "starvation a bargaining chip".

news.title: North Korea arrests senior official over warship launch failure
news.summary: The Workers' Party official was "largely responsible" for the botched launch, state media said.
